children.name: galerie_shape_basic
children.description: Figures in the draw2d.shape.basic.* package

children.name: galerie_shape_diagram
children.description: Figures in the draw2d.shape.diagram.* package

children.name: galerie_shape_analog
children.description: Figures in the draw2d.shape.analog.* package

children.name: galerie_shape_widget
children.description: Figures in the draw2d.shape.widget.* package

children.name: galerie_shape_icon
children.description: Figures in the draw2d.shape.icon.* package

children.name: galerie_shape_node
children.description: Figures in the draw2d.shape.node.* package. Some standard in/out nodes.

children.name: composite_raft
children.description: Raft shape is a shape, which aggregate multiple primitive figures which are aboard the raft shape.

children.name: composite_group
children.description: A group is a figure that acts as a transparent container for other figures.

children.name: composite_jailhouse
children.description: A jailhouse organizes graphical objects into groups that share a common set of default properties and Z-order. Figures cannot moved outside of a jailhouse composite.

children.name: shape_custom_simple
children.description: Create a simple triangle figure. No magic, just to show how to implement your own vector figure.

children.name: shape_timer
children.description: A custom label with an internal timer which updates the text.

children.name: shape_anim_circle
children.description: A SetFigure and a little bit of sinus/cosinus mathematics. It is possible to drag&drop the figure as well.

children.name: figure_locator
children.description: Usage of a 'Locator' for a label which is bounded to a shape.

children.name: connection_with_contextmenu
children.description: A Connections which provides a simple context menu. Overrides the default connection type.

children.name: policy_selectionmenu
children.description: Install a menu policy into a shape to provide a flyout menu on selection.

children.name: shape_db
children.text: Dynamic ports and rows in a shape
children.description: Shape with a method to add or remove a row and the related ports.

children.name: shape_collapsible
children.description: Example implementation of an collapsible shape

children.name: shape_zoom_stack
children.description: Change the visual representation if you zoom in/out to the canvas

children.name: shape_zoom_svg
children.description: Change the SVG of a figure if you zoom in/out to the canvas

children.name: shape_tablelayout
children.description: Place child figures in the parent table layout.

children.name: interaction_dblclick_figure
children.description: Example how to handle a double click within a figure.

children.name: interaction_dblclick_policy
children.description: Example how to handle a double click with a policy.

children.name: interaction_labeledit_inplace
children.description: Event handling of a shape with children

children.name: interaction_click
children.description: Using timer, Sparkline and a simple click event to create a simple flow diagram

children.name: interaction_slider
children.description: Connect a slider as input for a animated Sparkline

children.name: interaction_pie
children.description: Using 3 sliders in combination with a pie chart. The sliders are the data source for the pie chart.

children.name: connection_labeledit_dialog
children.text: Edit a Label with a dialog
children.description: How to register a default editor for a label

children.name: connection_labeledit_inplace
children.description: How to register an inplace editor for a label

children.name: interaction_toFront
children.description: Bring an shape to front if the user click on them

children.name: interaction_draggable_decoration
children.description: A dynamic figure decoration which can be move via drag&drop

children.name: resizehandle_replace_global
children.description: Replace the default ResizeHandles with your custom implementation

children.name: resizehandle_styled_css
children.description: Override the default color of the resize handles with CSS

children.name: port_semantic_group
children.description: Only ports in the same semantic group can be connected.

children.name: port_locator
children.description: Add ports to a figure via API call with an locator for position calculation.

children.name: port_serialize
children.description: Load and save ports of shape to JSON

children.name: port_decoration
children.text: Create ports with configurable default values
children.description: Create a port with a visual configuration shape to select the default value to use

children.name: port_hide
children.description: Dynamic show or hides ports if they are connected. Show them again if you remove the connection

children.name: buildin_commandstack
children.description: Usage of the internal CommandStack for Undo/Redo operations

children.name: buildin_zoom
children.description: Simple setZoom and getZoom method in the Canvas class

children.name: buildin_bridge
children.description: Automatic bridging of crossing connectors

children.name: buildin_event
children.description: Canvas events for figure add, remove, zoom, clear,..

children.name: tooltip_diy
children.description: Tooltip implementation without any third party lib.

children.name: databinding_watchjs
children.description: Create a property sheet and sync the data with the third party lib watch.JS

children.name: databinding_backbone
children.description: Databinding with backboneJS without epoxy

children.name: databinding_backbone_modelbinder
children.description: Databinding with backboneJS with the support of the ModelBinder lib

children.name: databinding_js
children.description: Implementation of a property view without any additional lib for the databinding

children.name: databinding_rivets
children.description: Databinding with the integration of the RivetsJS lib

children.name: policy_canvas_decoration
children.description: Add special behavior to the canvas related the port visibility.

children.name: policy_selection_handling
children.description: Different kind of policies for selection handling, panning and editing

children.name: policy_selection_feedback
children.description: Using different policies for the selection feedback of a shape

children.name: policy_snap_to
children.description: Canvas policy for snap shapes during drag&drop within a grid or the geometry of other shapes

children.name: policy_figure_constraint
children.description: Install drag&drop edit policy. Constraint the region or direction for drag&drop operations.

children.name: policy_drag_copy
children.description: Copy the dragged shape if the user press the [shift] key during the drag&drop operation instead on moving the figure.

children.name: io_json_basic
children.description: Load a JSON document into the canvas. Additional the current canvas will be dumped as JSON.

children.name: io_json_extend
children.description: Read/Write a JSON document with custom attributes into the canvas.

children.name: io_json_connections
children.description: Load a JSON document into the canvas which respects connections too.

children.name: io_json_dyn_labels
children.description: Load a figure with dynamic count if labels. Additional one label is draggable

children.name: io_svg_basic
children.description: Export the canvas into a SVG document. The document can be loaded with any SVG editor like Inkscape or Sodipodi

children.name: io_json_multi_document
children.description: Loading multiple JSON documents into one canvas without to clear the cnavas before

children.name: io_png_overview
children.description: Export the canvas into a PNG image and show them as preview window.

children.name: io_png_crop
children.description: Export the canvas area that actually has objects in it to a PNG

children.name: connection_drop
children.description: Show how to infix a node into a Connection with a Drag&Drop operation

children.name: connection_vertex
children.description: Add, delete or move the vertex points of a connection.

children.name: connection_locator
children.description: Usage of a 'Locator' for a label which is bounded to a connection.

children.name: connection_decoration
children.description: Decorate the endpoints of a connections with different symbols like a Diamond, Circle, Arrow,...

children.name: connection_with_contextmenu
children.description: A Connections which provides a simple context menu. Overrides the default connection type.

children.name: connection_router
children.description: Different Connection router implementation for test purpose.

children.name: connection_rubberband
children.description: Example implementation for a custom router - a rubber band router.

children.name: connection_segment_handling
children.description: Use the conext menu to add or remove segments to the connection

children.name: buildin_bridge
children.description: Automatic bridging of crossing connectors

children.name: connection_anchor_chopbox
children.description: Set the anchor of an connection to the bounding box of the shape instead bounded to a port

children.name: connection_anchor_fan
children.description: Create parallel connections with the combination of an FanChonnectionAnchor and DirectRouter
